Detailed Description

Interface class that need to be implemented by user application.

Please see the following example for simple usage of TextWidget.

First you need write a class that public derived from Widget or some other UI component This class still should implement IPowerPanelUI interface. For example: 

 class MyPowerPanel : public IPowerPanelUI {
   public:
     virtual void init(gaia::core::Context* sysContext, gaia::core::Context* resContext) {
         mSysContext = new Context(*sysContext);
         mResContext = new Context(*resContext);
         mMyPowerPanelWidget = new MyPowerPanelWidget(...);
         ...
     }
     virtual gaia::core::Widget* getWidget() const {
         return getWidget();
     }
     virtual gaia::service::IPowerPanelUI* getIPowerPanelUI() const {
         return static_cast<IPowerPanelUI*>(mPowerPanelUI);
     }
   private:
     Context* mSysContext;
     Context* mResContext;
 }
